node.title: Afterwork hike : Sunset at Moucherotte
node.description:
Read the full page

== EN/FR ==
We speak English/French in all our events. Don't be worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas bilingue.

== Moucherotte : way up with sun, way down with headlight ==
Topo : https://www.visorando.com/randonnee-le-moucherotte-en-partant-de-saint-nizie/
Distance: 9km
Time: 3h of hike + 45min dinner + 45min drive
Drop : 750m

== Car share ==
Meet at Mairie de Seyssinet-Pariset (Tram C)
Beginning of the hike at parking du tremplin olympique (chemin de la roche)
Car share will cost 2‚Ç¨ per person

== Rules ==

* Don't be late
* Do not subscribe if you are not sure to join the event
* If you finally can't join us, please unsubscribe from the event or at least write a message here to announce your cancellation. That way, we won't wait for you
* If you are a driver and can't join, please send me a message through meetup ASAP, that way I can remove available seats
* Don't throw any dump in nature

== What do you need ==

* Hiking shoes (or any good sport shoes)
* Hiking pole (if you want)
* A headligth or any flashlight
* Water + food for dinner + Some snack
* Clothes for wind/cold
* Money for car share

== Covid ==

* Don't come if you feel sick, have fever, are contact case
* If we are more than 10 hikers, we will split in groups of maxi 10 people to respect current French Covid laws
* You are responsible to your own health, so respect barrier gestures, social distancing

If you have any questions, please ask !

node.title: ü•æ‚ö´‚ö´‚ö´ Insane 2 days hike - Only for warriors
node.description:
Read the full page
For people who have got their own equipment (lightweight tent, mattress, very warm sleeping bag, big backpack‚Ä¶)

It is forbidden to make fire in this place
Hard hike with heavy backpack / Not for noobs / Not for people scared of heights
== EN/FR ==
We speak English/French in all our events. Don't be worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas bilingue.

== Les Ecrins : le Lauvitel, la Muraillette (top at 3019m) et la Muzelle ==

Day 1 : La Danch√®re => lac du Lauvitel => col du Vallon => t√™te de la Muraillette => col du Vallon => lac de la Muzelle
Distance: 15km
Time: 7h of hike + 1h drive
Drop : 2050m D+ / 950m D-
Day 2 : lac de la Muzelle => la roche perc√©e => lac de la Muzelle => la Danch√®re
Distance: 17km
Time: 7h of hike + 1h drive
Drop : 1700m D- / 600m D+

A part of the path :
https://www.altituderando.com/Tete-de-la-Muraillette-3019-par-le-Lauvitel

== Car share ==
Meet at parking Porte de France
Beginning of the hike at village ¬´ La Danch√®re ¬ª
Car share will cost 5‚Ç¨ per person

== Rules ==
\- Don't be late
\- Do not subscribe if you are not sure to join the event
\- If you finally can't join us\, please unsubscribe from the event or at least write a message here to announce your cancellation\. That way\, we won't wait for you
\- If you are a driver and can't join\, please send me a message through meetup ASAP\, that way I can remove available seats
\- Don't throw any dump in nature

== What do you need ==
\- Hiking shoes
\- Hiking poles
\- Water \+ food for 2 days \(lunch\, dinner\, breakfist\) \+ some snack
\- Clothes for wind / cold / rain
\- Money for car share
\- Hat
\- Sunglasses
\- Sunscreen
\- Big backpack
\- Sleeping bag \(comfort temperature = 0¬∞C\)
\- Mattress
\- Light tent

== Covid ==
\- Don't come if you feel sick\, have fever\, are contact case
\- You are responsible to your own health\, so respect barrier gestures\, social distancing

If you have any questions, please ask !

node.title: ü•æüî¥ Hike: Cime de la Jasse ‚õ∞Ô∏è & Lac du V√©n√©tier üèä
node.description:
üí° Read full page by clicking on "Read more"/"Lire la suite"...üíú
Joining the event = Accepting the rules (See rule section below)

== ‚≠ê‚≠ê Updates ‚≠ê‚≠ê ==

* üòá My last hike before my holidays. See you in October for more hikes.
* üìÖ Sept 3 - 6pm: more cars = more seats. Seats: Albin (5), Paul (5), Samir (5)

== üó®Ô∏è EN/FR üó®Ô∏è ==
ü¶Ö/üêì : we speak English/French in all our events. Don't worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si votre niveau d'anglais n'est pas "suffisant".

== ü•æüî¥ Hike: Cime de la Jasse ‚õ∞Ô∏è & Lac du V√©n√©tier üèä ==

* üî¥ Long hike and walking on bare rocks (no path). Hiking shoes are mandatory.

Meet at parking "Esplanade du Souvenir Fran√ßais" near Parc Paul Mistral:

* ‚è∞ [https://www.osm.org/way/69486256](https://www.osm.org/way/69486256)
* ‚è∞ [https://goo.gl/maps/BAbHQ153PcNgunPd6](https://goo.gl/maps/BAbHQ153PcNgunPd6)

We ride our cars for \~1h. Then park at "Prapoutel":

* üÖøÔ∏è [https://www.osm.org/way/1091650303](https://www.osm.org/way/1091650303)
* üÖøÔ∏è [https://goo.gl/maps/se9kuryx49UjDpZ59](https://goo.gl/maps/se9kuryx49UjDpZ59)

We will do a loop by starting to go to "Habert d'Aiguebelle". Then we go to "Lac du V√©n√©tier", then "Cime de la Jasse". And after we go down, back to Prapoutel and then to Grenoble Technopole by car.

Topo & GPX track: [https://s.42l.fr/1hTNi_Ac](https://s.42l.fr/1hTNi_Ac) (click Export > GPX)
‚ñ∂üí° Download GPX on your phone (Tuto: [https://binnette.github.io/GAC](https://binnette.github.io/GAC/))
Distance: 17km
Time: \~6/7h of hike
D+: 1200m

=== üöó share ===
Car share will cost 5‚Ç¨ per person (fuel + "compensation" to get more drivers). üò∑ You have to wear a mask in car. Fuel is very expensive at this time...

== üí° Rules üí° ==

* üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è The GAC group is about hiking ü•æ and why not making friends BUT NOT about flirting or speed dating ‚õî
* üòç Hiking is about walking and enjoying nature
* Don't throw any dump üöÆ in nature even fruit pelt: üçå(2 years for decomposition), üçä (6 months); egg shell ü•ö (3 years)
* Subscribe on the waiting list. Maybe more cars will be available üöó
* Don't be (too) late üòá We won't wait for you at morning, especially if you don't send any message.
* Since seats in car(s) are "rare", please do not subscribe if you are not sure to join the event
* If you finally can't join us, please unsubscribe from the event or at least write a message here to announce your cancellation. üíú That way, we won't wait for you üíú
* If you are a driver and can't join, please send me a message through meetup ASAP, that way I can remove available seats üöó
* üíü You are responsible of your own health and security
* üò∑ Covid rules: [https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus](https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus)

== ‚ùî What do you need ‚ùî ==

* ü•æ Hiking shoes MANDATORY
* ü•¢ Hiking pole (recommended)
* ü©≥ü©± swimsuit + towel
* üßÉ Water (mini 2L) + üç´ Some snack + ü•ó food for lunch
* üåû Sun-cream / üòé Sun glasses
* üòÅ Your smile / üòä Happiness
* üò∑ Your mask as always (avoid contact and so on)
* üíµ Money for car share (exact change in cash)

***

If you have any questions, please ask!

See you! Albin from GAC.

PS: for more activities (cinema, tennis table, concert, etc), you can join our Telegram Channel. Just ask me by message on meetup or IRL (in real life).

node.title: ü•æ‚õ∫ Hike : 2 days/1 night in Belledonne üåÑüèäÔ∏è
node.description:
üí° Read full page by clicking on "Read more"/"Lire la suite"...üíú
Joining the event = Accepting the rules (See rule section below)

== ‚≠ê‚≠ê Updates ‚≠ê‚≠ê ==

* üìÖ August 17 - 8am: the hut is full. (max 8 people). If you want to join, you need a tent. And we need a driver ready to sleep in tent. Cars: Albin (4), Sina (4)

== üó®Ô∏è EN/FR üó®Ô∏è ==
ü¶Ö/üêì : we speak English/French in all our events. Don't worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si votre niveau d'anglais n'est pas "suffisant".

== ü•æ‚õ∫ Hike : 2 days/1 night in Belledonne üåÑüèäÔ∏è ==
2 day hike with a night in a "alpine hut". Note that It IS cold during the night. And the hut is "rustic" so be sure to grab a good sleeping bag and a warm jacket.

=== Day 1 ===
Meet at 8:30am **SHARP** at parking "Esplanade du Souvenir Fran√ßais":

* ‚è∞ [https://www.osm.org/way/69486256](https://www.osm.org/way/69486256)
* ‚è∞ [https://goo.gl/maps/BAbHQ153PcNgunPd6](https://goo.gl/maps/BAbHQ153PcNgunPd6)

1h of üöó to "Parking Pont de la Valoire":

* üÖøÔ∏è [https://www.osm.org/way/123378365](https://www.osm.org/way/123378365)
* üÖøÔ∏è [https://goo.gl/maps/xGjAJh8rw4RxYCMH9](https://goo.gl/maps/xGjAJh8rw4RxYCMH9)

Program:

* Hike in morning to join the hut: [https://s.42l.fr/FnDsAHLA](https://s.42l.fr/FnDsAHLA)
* Lunch on the way (picnic/sandwich)
* "Free afternoon" around the hut:
* Collecting wood
* More hike
* Games, etc.
* Diner and night in the hut

Topo & GPX track: [https://s.42l.fr/yusM5g7n](https://s.42l.fr/yusM5g7n) (click Export > GPX)
‚ñ∂üí° Download GPX on your phone (Tuto: [https://binnette.github.io/GAC](https://binnette.github.io/GAC/))
Distance: 9km
Time: \~5/6h of hike
D+: 876m

=== Day 2 ===
We hike to see 3 lakes: Lac Blanc, Lac Noir & Lac Glac√©.
And then go back to the car and to Grenoble üåÜ

Topo/GPX track: [https://s.42l.fr/13sX4kP7](https://s.42l.fr/13sX4kP7)
Distance: 13.5km
Time: \~5h of hike
D+: 1014m

=== üöó share ===
Car share: 7‚Ç¨ per person (fuel + toll + "compensation" to get more drivers).

== üí° Rules üí° ==

* Don't be (too) late üòá We won't wait for you at morning, especially if you don't send any message.
* Since seats in car(s) are "rare", please do not subscribe if you are not sure to join the event
* If you finally can't join us, please unsubscribe from the event or at least write a message here to announce your cancellation. üíú That way, we won't wait for you üíú
* üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è The GAC group is about hiking ü•æ and why not making friends BUT NOT about flirting or speed dating ‚õî
* üòç Hiking is about walking and enjoying nature
* Don't throw any dump üöÆ in nature even fruit pelt: üçå(2 years for decomposition), üçä (6 months); egg shell ü•ö (3 years)
* If you are a driver and can't join, please send me a message through meetup ASAP, that way I can remove available seats üöó
* üíü You are responsible of your own health and security
* üò∑ Covid rules: [https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus](https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus)

== ‚ùî What do you need ‚ùî ==
=== For hiking ===

* üéí A big hiking bag. You can not carry all your stuff in your hands or swinging down your bag... - mandatory 40 or 50 litters
* ü•æ Hiking shoes - mandatory to avoid slowing the group
* ü•¢ Hiking pole - highly recommended
* ü©≥ü©± swimsuit + towel
* üßÉ Water - 2 litters mini. we should have water near the hut
* üç´ Some snack
* ü•ï food for 4 meals:
* Saturday lunch - picnic/sandwich
* +dinner - food to cook if you have cooking stove + gas
* Sunday breakfast
* +lunch - again picnic/sandwich
* üçµ Ecocup/mug + fork, knife, trash bag, ...
* Clothes for wind/cold/rain ‚òî (if any)
* Suncream/Sunglasses üòé
* Your mask as always üò∑ (avoid contact and so on)
* Your smile üòÅ / Happiness üòä
* üíµ Money for car share

=== For the hut/night ===

* üí§ Sleeping bag + Sleeping pad
* Inflatable pillow (or use your shoes as pillow)
* üî• Cooking stove & camping gas if you want to cook food
* Lighter/Match to light a fire in the hut (if we want to)
* üë° Flip-flop is really nice to walk in/around the hut
* üí° Headlamp (mandatory)
* ü•∂ Warm clothes for the night
* üßª Toilet paper, soap, toothbrush, ...
* Space blanket (just in case)

== ‚ùî Want to bring more stuff ‚ùî ==

* ü™î Some candle to leave in the alpine hut
* ‚ô£Ô∏è Card games to play during Saturday afternoon/night
* A book if you want to chill Saturday afternoon
* Some food to share
* ü´ñ Tea bags to share or other stuffs

***

If you have any questions, please ask!
See you! Albin from GAC.

PS: for more activities (cinema, tennis table, concert, etc), you can join our Telegram Channel. Just ask me by message on meetup or IRL (in real life).

node.title: üí¶ü•æüî¥‚ö´ Aqua-Hike: exploration of Sarcenas river üí¶ü•æüèä
node.description:
üí° Read full page by clicking on "Read more"/"Lire la suite"...üíú
Joining the event = Accepting the rules (See rule section below)

üí•üí• READ THE '**WARNING**' SECTION üí•üí•

== ‚≠ê‚≠ê Updates ‚≠ê‚≠ê ==

* üìÖ August 12 - 8pm: more cars = more seats. Seats: Albin (5), Paul (5), Aymen (5), Amel (1 with bike)

== üó®Ô∏è EN/FR üó®Ô∏è ==
ü¶Ö/üêì : we speak English/French in all our events. Don't worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si votre niveau d'anglais n'est pas "suffisant".

== üí¶ü•æüî¥‚ö´ Aqua-Hike: exploration of Sarcenas river üí¶ü•æüèä ==

* üî¥‚ö´ No path "hike". We will just go down by walking in river üòÖ Please read the instructions in WARNING section.

Meet at parking "Esplanade du Souvenir Fran√ßais" near Parc Paul Mistral:

* ‚è∞ [https://www.osm.org/way/69486256](https://www.osm.org/way/69486256)
* ‚è∞ [https://goo.gl/maps/BAbHQ153PcNgunPd6](https://goo.gl/maps/BAbHQ153PcNgunPd6)

We ride our cars for \~30mn. Then park in Quaix-en-Chartreuse:

* üÖøÔ∏è [https://www.osm.org/way/1085291285](https://www.osm.org/way/1085291285)
* üÖøÔ∏è [https://goo.gl/maps/jfpkXtQ59nUx1txB8](https://goo.gl/maps/jfpkXtQ59nUx1txB8)

== üí•üí• WARNING üí•üí• ==
YOU HAVE TO KNOW HOW TO SWIM

üî¥‚ö´ We will hike on regular path from Quaix to Sarcenas. Have launch in Sarcenas.

üí¶ Then we literally jump in the river with everything (clothes, phone, shoes, wallet, etc). And we "hike" down inside the river to go back to Quaix. Be sure that you will be completely wet.

üíß Everything you bring will be wet. If you have waterproof bag TAKE IT, otherwise DO NOT TAKE your phone, wallet, etc. They will just die in the river! If you really want to take your phone put it in 1 or even 2 zip bags. But I am not responsible if you break your phone by jumping or because of water üòÖ

üí¢ We will encounter many obstacles: waterfall, spiky bush, stinging bush, big trees fallen in river, sharp rocks, etc.

üëû You will keep your shoes all the way to walk in the river on the sharp rocks. Be careful, this "hike" is for "experts" only.

üí• Once we started to hike in the river there is no escape until the hand of the hike.

üî¥ Hopefully we can do the hike in the river. But It may be possible that we will be stuck at some point and go back to find another path.

‚ö´ Please only join this "hike" is you are aware of the potential dangers and the needed equipment.

Topo & GPX track: [https://s.42l.fr/sCnbtrNh](https://s.42l.fr/sCnbtrNh) (click Export > GPX)
‚ñ∂üí° Download GPX on your phone (Tuto: [https://binnette.github.io/GAC](https://binnette.github.io/GAC/))
Distance: 12km
Time: \~5/6h of hike
D+: 650m

=== üöó share ===
Car share will cost 3‚Ç¨ per person (fuel + "compensation" to get more drivers). üò∑ You have to wear a mask in car. Fuel is very expensive at this time...

== üí° Rules üí° ==

* üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è The GAC group is about hiking ü•æ and why not making friends BUT NOT about flirting or speed dating ‚õî
* üòç Hiking is about walking and enjoying nature
* Don't throw any dump üöÆ in nature even fruit pelt: üçå(2 years for decomposition), üçä (6 months); egg shell ü•ö (3 years)
* Subscribe on the waiting list. Maybe more cars will be available üöó
* Don't be (too) late üòá We won't wait for you at morning, especially if you don't send any message.
* Since seats in car(s) are "rare", please do not subscribe if you are not sure to join the event
* If you finally can't join us, please unsubscribe from the event or at least write a message here to announce your cancellation. üíú That way, we won't wait for you üíú
* If you are a driver and can't join, please send me a message through meetup ASAP, that way I can remove available seats üöó
* üíü You are responsible of your own health and security
* üò∑ Covid rules: [https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus](https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus)

== ‚ùî What do you need ‚ùî ==

* ü•æ Water ready shoes (any non slippery shoes that you can put in river, fully submerges in water). Please read WARNING section.
* ü©≥ü©± swimsuit + towel
* üéí Waterproof bag
* üì± Waterproof bag for your phone if you want to take it
* üëï dry clothes for after hike that can stay in car trunk
* üßÉ Water (mini 2L) + üç´ Some snack + ü•ó food for lunch
* üåû Sun-cream / üòé Sun glasses
* üòÅ Your smile / üòä Happiness
* üò∑ Your mask as always (avoid contact and so on)
* üíµ Money for car share (exact change in cash)

***

If you have any questions, please ask!

See you! Albin from GAC.

PS: for more activities (cinema, tennis table, concert, etc), you can join our Telegram Channel. Just ask me by message on meetup or IRL (in real life).

node.title: üö£üîµ Hike+Canoe: 12km hike to Bois Fran√ßais, 20km canoe back to Grenoble üö£
node.description:
üí° Read the full page by clicking on "Read more"/"Lire la suite"...üíú
Joining the event = Accepting the rules (See rule section below)

1. üìë Read section "How to subscribe" bellow üîΩ
2. ‚ùó You HAVE TO know how to "swim" üèä‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è (at least 25 meters with your head temporary under water. Read [https://canoe-grenoble.com/infos-pratiques/](https://canoe-grenoble.com/infos-pratiques/)) But don't worry you will have life jacket and helmet.

== ‚≠ê‚≠ê Updates ‚≠ê‚≠ê ==

* üì¢ August 5 - 2pm Last chance to book your boat trip for tomorrow! I will close inscriptions near 5pm and communicate the final list to the canoe company.

* üì¢ To people on the waiting list, book as soon as possible (by following steps in 'How to subscribe'). The canoe company needs to know ASAP how many people are going.
* üì¢ August 2 - 11pm: canoe company confirmed up to 36 people. Book on August 13 and they will move your subscription to 6.
When you booked for August 13, send me your info by private message (last name, first name, birth date and zipcode)

== üó®Ô∏è EN/FR üó®Ô∏è ==
ü¶Ö/üêì : we speak English/French in all our events. Don't be worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si votre niveau d'anglais n'est pas "suffisant".

== üö£ Hike+Canoe: 12km hike to Bois Fran√ßais, 20km canoe back to Grenoble üö£ ==
12km hike to go near Bois Fran√ßais (we won't enter the lake because it is disgusting and not free to enter). Have lunch near the lake entrance. Then canoe at 2:45pm and go back in Grenoble (at Pont d‚ÄôOxford near CEA). Then we can hike back to city center.

Topo & GPX track: [https://s.42l.fr/QMva2WON](https://s.42l.fr/QMva2WON)
‚ñ∂üí° Download GPX track on your phone.
Distance: 12km
Time: 3h hike + 1h lunch + 4h of canoe

Meet at "Fontaine des trois Ordres" at Place Notre-Dame in city center:

* ‚è∞ [https://www.osm.org/way/236529929](https://www.osm.org/way/236529929)
* ‚è∞ [https://goo.gl/maps/DCsH23yUaw8HsvFC8](https://goo.gl/maps/DCsH23yUaw8HsvFC8)

== üö£ About canoeing üö£ ==
I've done this event 1 year ago. In my opinion, it is open to beginners. There is no "extreme" difficulty. You row your boat with 1 or 2 people. You can make team of "I want fun and go crazy underwater canoeing" or "I prefer to stay as dry as a bone". No need to have a lot of muscles, the river will push us gently to the end. Just don't miss the finish line on the left of Oxford bridge.

‚ùó You HAVE TO know how to swim (at least 25 meters with your head temporary under water: [https://canoe-grenoble.com/infos-pratiques/](https://canoe-grenoble.com/infos-pratiques/) (READ IT). Note you will wear life jacket and helmet provided by the company.

Note that we won't have any shadow during the whole afternoon. So take sun-cream/sunglasses/hat/water/etc. Wearing shoes and a long short will prevent you to get burned by the sun.

We will have tiny dry barrel so you can put a tiny bag with your phone and papers inside.

== üí≤ How to subscribe? üí≤ ==

1. Subscribe on this event waiting list
2. Go on [https://canoe-grenoble.com/reservation-parcours-decouverte/](https://canoe-grenoble.com/reservation-parcours-decouverte/)
3. Select Saturday August 13 (Or August 7 if not working) Anyway the company will move you on August 6
4. Select 02:00pm
5. Select 1 "Sans transport - rdv Bois fran√ßais √† 14h45..." at 25‚Ç¨
6. üëÄ (If there is no place available, just post a message here, I will phone the company)
7. Complete the form and pay online the 25‚Ç¨
8. Send me a private message on meetup to confirm that you paid and give me your info: first name / last name / birth date / zipcode
9. I will then add you in the "going list" on the meetup event

== üí° Rules üí° ==

* üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è The GAC group is about hiking ü•æ and why not making friends BUT NOT about flirting or speed dating ‚õî
* Don't be (too) late üòá We won't wait for you at morning, especially if you don't send any message.
* üíü You are responsible of your own health and security
* üò∑ Covid rules [https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus](https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus)

== ‚ùî What do you need ‚ùî ==
Don't bring a lot of stuff, cause we need them to fit in a tiny waterproof barrel.

* üéí A tiny bag that fit into the dry barrel (see in main picture)
* Water ready shoes ü•æ (any kind of shoes that you don't mind putting in the water) You will use your shoes on the boat and on the beach.
* üßÉ Water (mini 2/3L) + üç´ Some snack + ü•ó food for lunch
* A piece of strong string to attach your water bottles to the boat. That way, you don't loose them and they stay fresh in the river.
* ü©≥ü©± swimsuit + towel
* üçÉ Clothes for wind, rain (if any)
* üåû Sun-cream / üòé Sun glasses / üëí Hat
* üòÅ Your smile / üòä Happiness
* üò∑ Your mask as always (avoid contact and so on)

***

If you have any questions, please ask!

See you! Albin from GAC.

PS : for more activities, you can join our Telegram group. Just ask me by message on meetup or IRL (in real life).

node.title: ü•æüî¥ Hike: Le Tabor 2389m & Le Piquet de Nantes üóª+üèä‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
node.description:
üí° Read the full page by clicking on "Read more"/"Lire la suite"...üíú
Joining the event = Accepting the rules (See rule section below)

== ‚≠ê‚≠ê Updates ‚≠ê‚≠ê ==

* üìÖ July 28 - 1pm: more cars = more seats. Seats: Albin (5), Fran√ßois (4), David (5)

== üó®Ô∏è EN/FR üó®Ô∏è ==
ü¶Ö/üêì : we speak English/French in all our events. Don't worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si votre niveau d'anglais n'est pas "suffisant".

== ü•æüî¥ Hike: Le tabor 2389m & Le Piquet de Nantes üóª+üèä‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è ==

* üîµ Ok for good hikers
* üî¥ Hard for noobs üôÉ

Meet at parking "Esplanade du Souvenir Fran√ßais" near Parc Paul Mistral:

* ‚è∞ [https://www.osm.org/way/69486256](https://www.osm.org/way/69486256)
* ‚è∞ [https://goo.gl/maps/BAbHQ153PcNgunPd6](https://goo.gl/maps/BAbHQ153PcNgunPd6)

We ride our cars for \~50m. Then park our car(s) at St-Honor√©:

* üÖøÔ∏è [https://www.osm.org/way/1081836198](https://www.osm.org/way/1081836198)
* üÖøÔ∏è [https://goo.gl/maps/gLa6XQ6BYE7oknWY9](https://goo.gl/maps/gLa6XQ6BYE7oknWY9)

We hike to Lac Charlet (swim if we can). Go top of Le Tabor 2389m and enjoy the view. Go down to Le Piquet de Nantes (2214m). Then Go back to cars by another way. After we can try to do "Urbex" (Urban eXploration) of the old ski station. Then eventually we can go to Lac de Petichet and swim there. Finally go back to Grenoble Bermude City.

Topo & GPX track: [https://s.42l.fr/IOEHCbbH](https://s.42l.fr/IOEHCbbH) (click Export > GPX)
‚ñ∂üí° Download GPX on your phone (Tuto: [https://binnette.github.io/GAC](https://binnette.github.io/GAC/))

Time: \~5/6h of hike
